00024 #ifndef _SHA1_OSTREAM_HPP_
00025 #define _SHA1_OSTREAM_HPP_
00026 
00027 
00028 #include "SHA1Calculator.hpp"
00029 #include "boost/iostreams/filtering_stream.hpp"
00030 #include "boost/iostreams/filter/symmetric.hpp"
00031 #include <string>
00032 
00033 
00034 namespace pwiz {
00035 namespace util {
00036 
00037 
00038 /// model of boost::iostreams::SymmetricFilter
00039 class SHA1SymmetricFilter 
00040 {
00041     public:
00042 
00043     typedef char char_type;
00044 
00045     bool filter(const char*& src_begin, const char* src_end,
00046                 char*& dest_begin, char* dest_end, bool flush)
00047     {
00048         const char* dest_begin_orig = dest_begin;
00049 
00050         for (; src_begin!=src_end && dest_begin!=dest_end; ++src_begin, ++dest_begin)
00051             *dest_begin = *src_begin;
00052 
00053         sha1_.update(reinterpret_cast<const unsigned char*>(dest_begin_orig), 
00054                      dest_begin - dest_begin_orig);
00055 
00056         return false;
00057     }
00058 
00059     void close() {}
00060 
00061     std::string hash() 
00062     {
00063         return sha1_.hashProjected();
00064     };
00065 
00066     private:
00067     SHA1Calculator sha1_;
00068 };
00069 
00070 
00071 /// model of boost::iostreams::Filter
00072 class SHA1Filter : public boost::iostreams::symmetric_filter<SHA1SymmetricFilter>
00073 {
00074     public:
00075 
00076     typedef boost::iostreams::symmetric_filter<SHA1SymmetricFilter> base_type;
00077 
00078     SHA1Filter(int bufferSize)
00079     :   base_type(bufferSize)
00080     {}
00081 
00082     std::string hash() {return this->filter().hash();}
00083 };
00084 
00085 
00086 /// ostream filter for calculating a SHA-1 hash of data on the fly 
00087 class SHA1_ostream : public boost::iostreams::filtering_ostream
00088 {
00089     public:
00090 
00091     SHA1_ostream(std::ostream& os, int bufferSize = 4096)
00092     :   os_(os), filter_(bufferSize)
00093     {
00094         push(filter_);
00095         push(os);
00096     }
00097 
00098     std::string hash() {return filter_.hash();}
00099 
00100     void explicitFlush()
00101     {
00102         // hack: not flushing properly with the filter in the pipeline
00103         pop(); // this flushes os_ explicitly
00104         push(os_);
00105     }
00106 
00107     private:
00108     std::ostream& os_;
00109     SHA1Filter filter_;
00110 };
00111

00113 } // namespace util
00114 } // namespace pwiz
